name: Forest Of Zombies
description:
The Game :

You Start In a Zombie Forest And Try To Kill 50 Zombie To Win The Game , But Beware If You Lose Your Health , You Will Not Be Able To Restore It 

Important Note : 

The Number Of Kills With a Grenade Does Not Count

Control :

W.S.D.A : Move

Space : Jump

R : Reload Weapon

T : Pause Game

1 : Select Ak-47 Weapon

2 : Select M4A1 Weapon 

Left Mouse Button : Fire

Right Mouse Button : Aim

Left Ctrl : Crouch

Left Shift : Sprint

G : Throw Grenade
